article.title: What does a convolutional neural network recognize in the moon?

multiple_choice_question.text: Which animal is NOT typically associated with the lunar surface pattern according to Figure 1?
What is the kernel size used in the convolutional layers of the neural network shown in Figure 2?
How many groups are the training images divided into for training the Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) as shown in Figure 3?
What is used to determine the final probability of the lunar image being categorized as a specific animal, as shown in Figure 4?
choices: The highest probability from a single CNN.
The mean probability from all four CNNs.
The sum of probabilities from all four CNNs.
A majority vote based on the classifications from each CNN.

multiple_choice_question.text: According to Figure 5, which animal has the highest probability of being recognized from the lunar pattern with Mare Frigoris?
choices: All animals have an equal probability.

multiple_choice_question.text: When Mare Frigoris is excluded from the lunar pattern, which animal\'s probability of recognition significantly DECREASES according to Figure 6?
